Comment.Content:
Hi,
Thanks for this wonderful review. I am in the process of working on a newer release, which will be based on .NET 4.0, will make use of fluent notation, and incorporate all your comments as well as more.
Request you to plz provide a list of features that you want to see in version 2.0.
P.S.: Based on my hectic schedule these days, I am not getting more than an hour every night to work on it. The planned release is somewhere by the end of may.
Regards Naweed
Comment.Author: Naweed Akram
Comment.AuthorUserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.6) Gecko/20091201 Firefox/3.5.6

Comment.Content: Hi, I have released v.2.0. It is available here. Regards Naweed
Comment.Author: Naweed Akram
Comment.AuthorUserAgent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; InfoPath.1; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)
